0: The upshot is that this place has a great downtown location and fairly comfortable rooms but if you need wi fi in your room I would avoid it and I would be prepared to deal with unresponsive unhelpful maintenance both in regard to guest rooms and meeting rooms
They are recently ish renovated for the most part but many New York City hotel rooms are larger than what mine was
